fields.description:
In KS, go to Base UI > Vertical Layout > Table View.

This causes KS to crash in emulator.
fields.summary: Android: Vertical Layout: V8 only: Table view crashes on emulator

comments.body:
Tested with Mobile SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111116153454
Ti Studio version 1.0.7.201111151932
OSX Lion
Emulator 2.2 and 2.3.1, Galaxy Tab 10.1 OS Version 3.1, Nexus S OS version 2.3.6, Droid 1 OS 2.2.2 

Results:
Expected behavior is shown
